thread.title: Transportation Safety Board of Canada deploys team to Trois-Rivières, Quebec, following collision between bulk carrier and tug
thread.title_full: Transportation Safety Board of Canada deploys team to Trois-Rivières, Quebec, following collision between bulk carrier and tug - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Transportation Safety Board of Canada deploys team to Trois-Rivières, Quebec, following collision between bulk carrier and tug
text:
Transportation Safety Board of Canada
QUÉBEC, le 15 Oct. 2015 /CNW Telbec/ - The Transportation Safety Board of Canada (TSB) is deploying a team to Trois-Rivières, Quebec , following the collision between the bulk carrier Desert Rhapsody and the tug Ocean Basque . The TSB will gather information and assess the occurrence.
The TSB is an independent agency that investigates marine, pipeline, railway and aviation transportation occurrences. Its sole aim is the advancement of transportation safety. It is not the function of the Board to assign fault or determine civil or criminal liability.
The TSB is online at www.tsb.gc.ca . Keep up to date through RSS , Twitter (@TSBCanada), YouTube , Flickr and our blog .
